name: un-osaa-data-catalog
description: A comprehensive data catalog for the United Nations Office of the Special Adviser on Africa (UN OSAA) - Modern JSON-based architecture

scripts.build: echo 'Static site - no build process needed'
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy to GitHub Pages' && git push origin main
scripts.validate-json: node -e "console.log('Validating JSON files...'); try { JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('data.json', 'utf8')); JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('reports.json', 'utf8')); console.log('✅ All JSON files are valid'); } catch(e) { console.error('❌ JSON validation failed:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"

author: UN OSAA Team
